keyFacts: The document details account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account.
The ending balance as of April 30, 2015, is reported as $597,397.79.
Multiple checks were paid during the statement period, with the largest being $27,824.08.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF (non-sufficient funds) fees reported for this statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries related to the account.
